text: a l laoh kuchea anak del ban bangkeut phendei chea kanleng rsanow samreab puok anak haey( trong ban bangkeut) mekh chea dambaul . haey trong ban bangkeut puok anak aoy mean chearoubreang ning ban thveu aoy roubreang robsa puok anak la braneit promteang ban bratan leaphosakkar da la dl puok anak tiet phng . noh haey ku a l laoh chea mcheasa robsa puok anak . haey a l laoh mha utdongk utdam del chea mcheasa krobkrong piphp teangoasa
